subtitle: Maibatsu MonstroCiti
content:
GTA+ Members can claim the new Maibatsu MonstroCiti for free through July 19.

The Maibatsu MonstroCitiâ€™s reputation already precedes it: a family-friendly SUV that leads a double life as a sporty competitor. Plus, you can equip it with Imani Tech upgrades like the Remote Control Unit and a Missile Lock-On Jammer.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
